tech.lity.rea.skatolo.events

Class ControlBroadcaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • tech.lity.rea.skatolo.events.ControlBroadcaster

  • public class ControlBroadcaster
extends Object
    The ControlBroadcaster handles all controller value changes and distributes them accordingly to its listeners. The ControlBroadcaster is primarily for internal use only but can be accessed through an instance of the skatolo class. Instead of accessing the ControlBroadcaster directly, use the convenience methods available from the skatolo class.
    See Also:
    skatolo.skatolo#getControlBroadcaster()
